mapper.insert: INSERT INTO popcorn.mycalendar (movieId, member_id, year, month, day) VALUES (#{movieId}, #{member_id}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day})
mapper.select: SELECT year, month, day, movieTitle From popcorn.mycalendar JOIN movie ON mycalendar.movieId = movie.movieId WHERE year = #{year} AND month = #{month} AND member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY day ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM popcorn.mycalendar WHERE YEAR = #{year} AND MONTH = #{month} AND DAY = #{day} AND member_id = #{member_id}
